on what bedbugs look like, and how to inspect and sanitize belongings. Many people just want to discard all luggage and clothing after discovering an infestation, but Kells and Jeff Hahn say this is unnecessary. The key is to contain all items suspected of carrying bed bugs in plastic bags until the items can be laundered, washed by hand, heated, or frozen, they advise. Hyper9 enables IT organizations to efficiently and effectively manage todays dynamic virtualized environment by providing visibility and control, all in an easy-to-navigate application. Windows Azure is in a great place, and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career. He has done stellar work for the company and I will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team, said Steve Ballmer . It's thought that Amitabh Srivastava 's exit is connected to Microsoft's announcement that company veteran Satya Nadella would replace Bob Muglia as head of Server and Tools.
